tasks.task: Observing and interacting with farm animals
subtasks: Watching farm animals move (sheep skipping, horse galloping, cow wobbling)
Noticing animal behaviors (dog barking, panting, sheep looking, horse galloping, cow wobbling, pig fatness, chicken squawking, pecking, duck quacking, looking, cat curiosity)
Identifying farm animals (sheep, horse, cow, pig, chicken, duck, cat)
Hearing animal vocalizations (dog barking, horse galloping sounds, cow "choo choo," pig gobbling, chicken squawking, duck quacking)

tasks.task: Engaging with pets or working animals
subtasks: Watching a dog (possibly a guard dog or helper)
Observing a cat (possibly a house cat or barn cat)
Noting the health or condition (sheep skipping, pig fatness)
